title: Random lag Spikes
body: Horrible lag spikes, i will go from 60 ping then 300 or more... i can only play bots now cause its way to frustrating to play online. Ive used the hextech repair tool, ive allowed league in my firewall, ive done all that i can think of, so hopefully someone can please help. would appreciate it

replies.body: It sounds like you are having some form of network problem or packet loss, which would result in these high and sudden jumps.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what is happening exactly.  It'll clarify what's happening as well as provide some troubleshooting steps.  Let me know if you have any questions!
